name: aemi-dark-syntax
readme:
# aemi

## dark syntax theme

**aemi dark syntax** is a minimalist dark syntax theme for Atom. It is designed to save our eyes, with black background and vibrant colors.

**aemi dark syntax** is also designed to be used with **[aemi dark ui](https://github.com/originecode/aemi-dark-ui "originecode:aemi-dark-ui: Aesthetic Minimalist Dark UI Theme")**, a minimalist black UI theme for Atom.

Notice : I personnaly use SF Mono as monospace font, but I recommend you [FiraCode](https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode "tonsky/FiraCode: Monospaced font with programming ligatures"), [Office Code Pro](https://github.com/nathco/Office-Code-Pro "nathco/Office-Code-Pro: Customized version of Source Code Pro") or [Hack](https://sourcefoundry.org/hack/ "Hack | A typeface designed for source code") font.
